description:
The sun, the star at the center of our solar system. Generally depicted as a golden-yellow disc radiating eight triangular rays, representing the sun’s heat and light.

Commonly used to represent sunny, warm, or hot weather, light, heat, energy, life, outer space, astronomy, and various positive and happy (sunny) feelings. As such, this emoji tends to spike in popularity during the summer months.

apple_vendor_description: The sun emoji on Apple devices radiates a cheerful, bright yellow with a distinct glossy 3D effect, featuring soft rounded edges that make it feel almost tangible.  Apple's realistic lighting casts a warm glow, emphasizing its radiant energy and cheerful disposition.  This iconic symbol of a new day, warmth, and happiness is universally understood and frequently used on Apple devices to convey optimism, good weather, or a bright outlook.
